00035 template <class SupplierInterface, class Product>
00036 class TSupplierCompWrap:
00037                      public ibase::CLoggerComponentBase,
00038                      virtual public SupplierInterface
00039 {
00040 public:
00041        typedef ibase::CLoggerComponentBase BaseClass;
00042 
00043        enum MessageId
00044        {
00045               MI_DURATION_TIME = 0x077a1b
00046        };
00047 
00048        I_BEGIN_BASE_COMPONENT(TSupplierCompWrap);
00049               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(ISupplier);
00050               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(SupplierInterface);
00051               I_ASSIGN(m_diagnosticNameAttrPtr, "DiagnosticName", "Name of this supplier for diagnostic, if it is not set, no diagnostic log message will be send", false, "");
00052               I_ASSIGN(m_paramsSetCompPtr, "ParamsSet", "Parameters set describing model parameter used to produce results", false, "ParamsSet");
00053               I_ASSIGN_TO(m_paramsSetModelCompPtr, m_paramsSetCompPtr, false);
00054        I_END_COMPONENT;
00055 
00056        TSupplierCompWrap();
00057 
00058        // pseudo-reimplemented (iproc::ISupplier)
00059        virtual void InvalidateSupplier();
00060        virtual void EnsureWorkFinished();
00061        virtual void ClearWorkResults();
00062        virtual int GetWorkStatus() const;
00063        virtual double GetWorkDurationTime() const;
00064        virtual iprm::IParamsSet* GetModelParametersSet() const;
00065        virtual void OnOutputSubscribed(ISupplier* outputSupplierPtr);
00066        virtual void OnOutputUnsubscribed(const ISupplier* outputSupplierPtr);
00067 
00068 protected:
00072        const Product* GetWorkProduct() const;
00073 
00077        void AddInputSupplier(ISupplier* supplierPtr);
00081        void RemoveInputSupplier(ISupplier* supplierPtr);
00085        void RemoveAllInputSuppliers();
00086 
00087        // abstract methods
00092        virtual int ProduceObject(Product& result) const = 0;
00093 
00094        // reimplemented (icomp::CComponentBase)
00095        virtual void OnComponentCreated();
00096        virtual void OnComponentDestroyed();
00097 
00098 private:
00099        I_ATTR(istd::CString, m_diagnosticNameAttrPtr);
00100        I_REF(iprm::IParamsSet, m_paramsSetCompPtr);
00101        I_REF(imod::IModel, m_paramsSetModelCompPtr);
00102 
00103        typedef std::set<ISupplier*> Suppliers;
00104        Suppliers m_inputSuppliers;
00105        Suppliers m_outputSuppliers;
00106 
00107        Product m_product;
00108        int m_workStatus;
00109        double m_durationTime;
00110 };

00115 template <class SupplierInterface, class Product>
00116 TSupplierCompWrap<SupplierInterface, Product>::TSupplierCompWrap()
00117 :      m_workStatus(WS_NONE),
00118        m_durationTime(0)
00119 {
00120 }

00123 template <class SupplierInterface, class Product>
00124 iprm::IParamsSet* TSupplierCompWrap<SupplierInterface, Product>::GetModelParametersSet() const
00125 {
00126        return m_paramsSetCompPtr.GetPtr();
00127 }

00130 // pseudo-reimplemented (iproc::ISupplier)
00131 
00132 template <class SupplierInterface, class Product>
00133 void TSupplierCompWrap<SupplierInterface, Product>::InvalidateSupplier()
00134 {
00135        if (m_workStatus == ISupplier::WS_LOCKED){
00136               return;
00137        }
00138 
00139        if (m_workStatus != ISupplier::WS_INIT){
00140               istd::CChangeNotifier notifier(this, ISupplier::CF_SUPPLIER_RESULTS);
00141 
00142               m_workStatus = ISupplier::WS_LOCKED;
00143 
00144               for (         Suppliers::const_iterator iter = m_outputSuppliers.begin();
00145                                    iter != m_outputSuppliers.end();
00146                                    ++iter){
00147                      ISupplier* supplierPtr = *iter;
00148                      I_ASSERT(supplierPtr != NULL);
00149 
00150                      supplierPtr->InvalidateSupplier();
00151               }
00152 
00153               m_workStatus = ISupplier::WS_INIT;
00154               m_durationTime = 0;
00155        }
00156 }
00157 
00158 
00159 template <class SupplierInterface, class Product>
00160 void TSupplierCompWrap<SupplierInterface, Product>::EnsureWorkFinished()
00161 {
00162        if (m_workStatus <= ISupplier::WS_INIT){
00163               istd::CChangeNotifier notifier(this, ISupplier::CF_SUPPLIER_RESULTS);
00164 
00165               m_workStatus = WS_LOCKED;
00166 
00167               istd::TSmartPtr<isys::ITimer> timerPtr(istd::CreateService<isys::ITimer>());
00168 
00169               if (timerPtr.IsValid()){
00170                      // before time measurement is started, we have to ensure that all input suppliers has work finished
00171                      for (         Suppliers::const_iterator iter = m_inputSuppliers.begin();
00172                                           iter != m_inputSuppliers.end();
00173                                           ++iter){
00174                             ISupplier* supplierPtr = *iter;
00175                             I_ASSERT(supplierPtr != NULL);
00176 
00177                             supplierPtr->EnsureWorkFinished();
00178                      }
00179 
00180                      timerPtr->Start();
00181               }
00182 
00183               m_workStatus = ProduceObject(m_product);
00184               I_ASSERT(m_workStatus >= WS_OK);   // No initial states are possible
00185 
00186               if (timerPtr.IsValid()){
00187                      m_durationTime = timerPtr->GetElapsed();
00188 
00189                      if (m_diagnosticNameAttrPtr.IsValid() && !(*m_diagnosticNameAttrPtr).empty()){
00190                             SendInfoMessage(MI_DURATION_TIME, *m_diagnosticNameAttrPtr + ": Calculation time " + istd::CString::FromNumber(m_durationTime * 1000) + " ms.");
00191                      }
00192               }
00193        }
00194 }
00195 
00196 
00197 template <class SupplierInterface, class Product>
00198 void TSupplierCompWrap<SupplierInterface, Product>::ClearWorkResults()
00199 {
00200        if (m_workStatus != ISupplier::WS_NONE){
00201               istd::CChangeNotifier notifier(this, ISupplier::CF_SUPPLIER_RESULTS);
00202 
00203               m_workStatus = ISupplier::WS_NONE;
00204               m_durationTime = 0;
00205 
00206               for (         Suppliers::const_iterator iter = m_inputSuppliers.begin();
00207                                    iter != m_inputSuppliers.end();
00208                                    ++iter){
00209                      ISupplier* supplierPtr = *iter;
00210                      I_ASSERT(supplierPtr != NULL);
00211 
00212                      supplierPtr->ClearWorkResults();
00213               }
00214        }
00215 }

00220 {
00221        return m_workStatus;
00222 }

00231 
00232 template <class SupplierInterface, class Product>
00233 void TSupplierCompWrap<SupplierInterface, Product>::OnOutputSubscribed(ISupplier* outputSupplierPtr)
00234 {
00235        I_ASSERT(outputSupplierPtr != NULL);
00236 
00237        m_outputSuppliers.insert(outputSupplierPtr);
00238 }
00239 
00240 
00241 template <class SupplierInterface, class Product>
00242 void TSupplierCompWrap<SupplierInterface, Product>::OnOutputUnsubscribed(const ISupplier* outputSupplierPtr)
00243 {
00244        I_ASSERT(outputSupplierPtr != NULL);
00245        I_ASSERT(m_outputSuppliers.find(const_cast<ISupplier*>(outputSupplierPtr)) != m_outputSuppliers.end());
00246 
00247        m_outputSuppliers.erase(const_cast<ISupplier*>(outputSupplierPtr));
00248 }
00249

00251 // protected methods
00252 
00253 template <class SupplierInterface, class Product>
00254 const Product* TSupplierCompWrap<SupplierInterface, Product>::GetWorkProduct() const
00255 {
00256        const_cast< TSupplierCompWrap<SupplierInterface, Product>* >(this)->EnsureWorkFinished();
00257 
00258        if (m_workStatus == WS_OK){
00259               return &m_product;
00260        }
00261        else{
00262               return NULL;
00263        }
00264 }
00265 
00266 
00267 template <class SupplierInterface, class Product>
00268 void TSupplierCompWrap<SupplierInterface, Product>::AddInputSupplier(ISupplier* supplierPtr)
00269 {
00270        I_ASSERT(supplierPtr != NULL);
00271 
00272        std::pair<Suppliers::iterator, bool> status = m_inputSuppliers.insert(supplierPtr);
00273 
00274        if (status.second){
00275               supplierPtr->OnOutputSubscribed(this);
00276        }
00277 }
00278 
00279 
00280 template <class SupplierInterface, class Product>
00281 void TSupplierCompWrap<SupplierInterface, Product>::RemoveInputSupplier(ISupplier* supplierPtr)
00282 {
00283        I_ASSERT(supplierPtr != NULL);
00284 
00285        supplierPtr->OnOutputUnsubscribed(this);
00286 
00287        m_inputSuppliers.erase(supplierPtr);
00288 }
00289 
00290 
00291 template <class SupplierInterface, class Product>
00292 void TSupplierCompWrap<SupplierInterface, Product>::RemoveAllInputSuppliers()
00293 {
00294        for (         Suppliers::const_iterator iter = m_inputSuppliers.begin();
00295                             iter != m_inputSuppliers.end();
00296                             ++iter){
00297               ISupplier* supplierPtr = *iter;
00298               I_ASSERT(supplierPtr != NULL);
00299 
00300               supplierPtr->OnOutputUnsubscribed(this);
00301        }
00302 
00303        m_inputSuppliers.clear();
00304 }
00305

00307 // reimplemented (icomp::CComponentBase)
00308 
00309 template <class SupplierInterface, class Product>
00310 void TSupplierCompWrap<SupplierInterface, Product>::OnComponentCreated()
00311 {
00312        BaseClass::OnComponentCreated();
00313 
00314        m_workStatus = ISupplier::WS_NONE;
00315 }
00316 
00317 
00318 template <class SupplierInterface, class Product>
00319 void TSupplierCompWrap<SupplierInterface, Product>::OnComponentDestroyed()
00320 {
00321        RemoveAllInputSuppliers();
00322 
00323        BaseClass::OnComponentDestroyed();
00324 }
